DOC.detailed_description: DESIGNING : Forty patient ASA physical status I II schedule elective surgery general anesthesia ( last 2h 4h ) enrol . Anesthesia induce propofol 1-2mg/kg sufentanyl 0.2-0.3μg/kg . Following muscle relaxation iv cisatracurium besylate 0.2mg/kg endotracheal intubation perform . Anesthesia maintain target control infusion propofol ( target concentration:1-2ug/ml ) remifentanil ( targeted concentration : 2-6ng/ml ) . Muscle relaxation maintain intermittent , inject 1h surgery completion . Propofol remifentanil titrate maintain bispectral index ( BIS ) 40 60 anesthesia . The end-tidal carbon dioxide level maintain 30 40 mmHg control mechanical ventilation . When surgery complete investigator adjust target concentration propofol 0.1ug/ml target concentration remifentanil 2ng/ml stop anesthetic . Dexmedetomidine group target control infusion dexmedetomidine ( induction dose 1ug/kg 10min , maintain dose 0.5ug/kg/h 30min surgery completion ) . Control group infusion saline . Record time stop anesthetic emergence total dos anesthetic .
